Name: MLB Home Run Derby VR
About the game: Step up to the plate and crush it in the most immersive and authentic Home Run Derby VR game presented by Major League Baseball! GOING, GOING, GONE! Hit home runs and rack up points in a timed home run competition. The motion based controls let you feel the speed and power of every swing at the plate. Choose between righty/lefty and multiple difficulty settings. 25 new ballparks added in 2021! Crush homers in ballparks across MLB! Climb four distinct leaderboards online! The competition comes alive in our unparalleled 3D environments. New for 2021 -- experience stepping up to the plate in 25 new ballparks in high fidelity graphics. Tag multipliers and hit it deep to climb to the top of the leaderboards and prove you are the ultimate Home Run Derby champion! PLAY ON YOUR PREFERRED DEVICE! MLB Home Run Derby VR supports HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, and Valve Index!
